thread.title: Super Bowl 2017: Tom Brady leads epic comeback, Patriots stun Falcons in OT - CBSSports.com
thread.title_full: Super Bowl 2017: Tom Brady leads epic comeback, Patriots stun Falcons in OT - CBSSports.com

author: Ryan Wilson
title: Super Bowl 2017: Tom Brady leads epic comeback, Patriots stun Falcons in OT - CBSSports.com
text:
5h ago â€¢ 1 min read 
The Falcons have been in existence for 51 years and Sunday was just their second Super Bowl appearance in team history. For 59 minutes, they were leading, and for 45 minutes, they were dominating a Patriots team that seemed helpless to do anything about it. But the Patriots overcame a 25-point deficit to take the game to overtime. They then won it, 34-28, on the very first series after James White dived in from 2 yards out. The 31 unanswered points in the thrilling comeback cements the Patriots' legacy as the greatest NFL franchise this century. 
It was New England's ninth Super Bowl appearance in team history, and the seventh in the Bill Belichick-Tom Brady era. And if not for Eli Manning and the Giants , Bill and Tom would be 7-0 in the championship game. We're guessing they'll settle for 5-2, especially given the THAT DID NOT JUST HAPPEN way they went about winning this one. 
Relive all the magic of the Super Bowl LI live blog below.
